events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I am quite disappointed.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
Assigning this refund case to Agent Lisa, who handles refund requests for incorrect orders.
Hello, I’m Lisa from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the incorrect item. Let me help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
Order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the item clearly, which is not what I ordered. I hope this can be resolved quickly.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately, and you should receive the credit within 5-7 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate your help and hope to shop with you again under better circumstances.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please reach out if you have any other questions.
Closing the case now as the refund process is complete and the customer has been confirmed satisfied. Thank you for contacting support.
